name: Circle vs Spikes
summary:
Hardcore arcade with simple one touch control (Android). 
 
Tap to switch rotation direction to avoid dangerous obstacles. Any contact with lasers, spikes, blades or blocks is fatal. Only the most skilled players will be able to reach the end. Fast reflexes, accuracy and spatial thinking is required. 
 
Each rotation switch costs 1 charge. The more charges you save, the more points you get. Total score defines your position in daily, weekly and all-time leaderboards. Compete with your friends and other players. 
 
Despite the simple one-tap gameplay, the game is very dynamic and hard to master. 
You can use slow-motion power-ups to get through tricky spots. 
During this journey you are accompanied by an awesome original synthwave soundtrack. 
 
Supports Google Play Games Services: 
  ✔ Leaderboards. 
  ✔ Achievements. For each unlocked achievement you also get a new skin or a color theme as a reward. 
  ✔ Cloud Saves. Sync your progress across multiple devices.
storyline: My name is Ibragim Vykov, I live in a small town Cherkessk in Russia. I’m a self-taught developer, and I’ve started to learn programming about two years ago. Recently I've released my first game 'Circle vs Spikes' on Google Play. Please check it out, it would mean the world to me. I'd also love to get feedback from you. Feel free to contact me: ibragames.com@gmail.com
